title.rendered: “Remembering Our Heroes: Updates on Fallen and Injured IDF Soldiers from Recent Gaza Strip Battle”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the name of a fallen IDF soldier, which has been delivered to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC21012024897543

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the details and photographs of the fallen soldiers are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in an event in which Staff Sergeant (Res.) Uriel Aviad Silverman, may he rest in peace, was killed, a Reserve Armored Officer and a Reserve Soldier in Battalion 7421, ‘Kiriyati Brigade’ (4), were severely injured.

Also, a Reserve Soldier in Battalion 466, ‘Sky Foxes’ (646) was severely injured in a battle in central Gaza Strip.

The injured were evacuated for medical treatment in hospitals and their families were updated.
